title: Council Decision of 9 October 2009 appointing Slovenian members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Social Security for Migrant Workers
header:
13.10.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 245/17
COUNCIL DECISION
of 9 October 2009
appointing Slovenian members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Social Security for Migrant Workers
2009/C 245/06
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EEC) No 1408/71 of 14 June 1971 on the application of social security schemes to employed persons, to self-employed persons and to members of their families moving within the Community (1), and in particular Article 82 thereof,
Having regard to the lists of candidates submitted to the Council by the Governments of the Member States,
Whereas:
(1) By its Decision of 30 March 2009 (2), the Council appointed the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Social Security for Migrant Workers for the period 30 March 2009 to 29 March 2011, with the exception of certain members including the Slovenian members and alternate members.
(2) The Slovenian Government has submitted nominations for a number of posts to be filled,
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Social Security for Migrant Workers for the period ending on 29 March 2011:
GOVERNMENT REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Slovenia Ms Jana LOVŠIN Ms Janja ROMIH
TRADE UNION REPRESENTATIVES
Country Members Alternates
Slovenia Ms Metka ROKSANDIĆ Mr Ivan AŠENBERGER
REPRESENTATIVES OF EMPLOYER'S ORGANISATIONS
Country Members Alternates
Slovenia Ms Urška JEREB Ms Slavi PIRŠ
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 9 October 2009.
For the Council
The President
Å. TORSTENSSON
(1)  OJ L 149, 5.7.1971, p. 2.
(2)  OJ C 83, 7.4.2009, p. 19.
